stories.title: Extract shared AbilityMarketplace component
acceptance: Accepts showDebugTabs prop (default false) controlling Run/Waves/History/Approvals tabs
Contains: header, HeartbeatStatusBar, LifecycleTimeline, bulk controls, status filters, ability cards grid, ActivityFeed
When showDebugTabs=true: also shows Tabs with Run/Waves/History/Approvals (existing behavior)
When showDebugTabs=false: hides the debug tabs entirely
AgentAbilitiesPage.tsx becomes a thin wrapper rendering <AbilityMarketplace showDebugTabs={true} />

stories.title: Create /agent/marketplace route + page + sidebar nav
acceptance: New page at src/pages/agent/AgentMarketplacePage.tsx renders <AbilityMarketplace showDebugTabs={false} />
Route /agent/marketplace registered in App.tsx with OrgAdminRouteGuard
Route registered in routeConfig.ts with access: 'orgAdmin'
New top-level 'Agent' nav item in AppLayout.tsx sidebar visible to org admins (and platform admins)
Nav item highlights when path starts with /agent

stories.title: Add marketplace CTA in ProactiveAgentSettings
acceptance: Banner or card with 'Explore the Abilities Marketplace' CTA inside ProactiveAgentSettings
Visible when master toggle is enabled (inside the isMasterEnabled section)
Links to /agent/marketplace using react-router-dom Link or useNavigate
Uses indigo/purple CTA styling consistent with app design
Includes a brief description like 'Discover and configure all available AI abilities'
